mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (no, title, content, file_name, writer, write_date, hits, image_name) VALUES (#{no}, #{title}, #{content}, #{fileName}, #{writer}, #{writeDate}, #{hits}, #{imageName})
mapper.select: SELECT AAA.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM() as rn, notice.* FROM notice ORDER BY no DESC)AAA WHERE AAA.rn BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

select.if: SELECT BBB.* FROM(SELECT ROWNUM() as rn, AAA.* FROM(SELECT * FROM notice WHERE ${select} like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') ORDER BY no ASC)AAA)BBB WHERE rn BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
SELECT BBB.* FROM(SELECT ROWNUM() as rn, AAA.* FROM(SELECT * FROM notice WHERE ${select} = #{search} ORDER BY no ASC)AAA)BBB WHERE rn BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET hits = hits+1 WHERE no = #{no}
UPDATE notice SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE no = #{no}
UPDATE notice SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, file_name = #{fileName} WHERE no = #{no}
